channel.title: Hacked
channel.description:
So I started playing again. Had a lvl 60 account. Trained it all the way up to lvl 87. Took me hours. Then I got a message saying my account was in danger zone. I believed it and enter my name and password. The idiot took like everything I had.
This really sucks, jagex has a very bad security system... =/
Lost a few hundreds of k and many important member item, dragon items etc.

item.title: Hacked
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Sorry but hacked threads are no longer allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

hawkgames:

Why would you go on the computer while your drunk to play runescape?

He said that because he wasn’t really drunk, hes 13 has no friends and got to exited when he got an email so he blindly entered his information. Did I hit an soft spots?

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked
item.dc:creator: @hawkgames hawkgames
item.description:
@hawkgames wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:6, topic:400326”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=497401.msg3637081#msg3637081 date=1308676146]

[quote author=someone2 link=topic=497401.msg3637072#msg3637072 date=1308675986]

The idiot took like everything I had.
[/quote]no, the smart kid took everything you had.

the idiot clicked the link and typed their username in

Problem was I was like drunk when I saw it. Didnt really pay attention to things. And the e-mail got on my e-mail account, the same registered on runescape.
[/quote]jagex says they will never email regarding your account security.
so, you’re an idiot.

I don’t read the rules and things, really…[/quote]

If you didn’t, don’t post this since you said jagex have a bad security system, it’s actually you who didn’t read the rules.

Read full topic
